comments.body: we only have a single class in this file, we can rename the file to `IgnoreCachedData.scala`
comments.diffHunk:

+trait IgnoreCachedData {}

comments.body:
we can also improve the comments
```
/**
 * A [[LogicalPlan]] operator that does not use the cached results stored in CacheManager.
 */
trait IgnoreCachedData extends LogicalPlan
```
